Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
  Simulator

public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object

This is the main class of the "Planets" application. Planets is a fun and educational solar system simulator currently under development. This is the first working release.

Version:
1.0.1 28 Feb 2009
Author:
Robin Smith

Constructor Summary
Simulator()
          Create the simulator and initialise: the GUI, planets, an instance of Random and a load of simulation parameters to default values.
 
Method Summary
 void decreaseCentralMass()
          Decreases the mass (by a factor of 2) of centralPlanet.
 void decreasePlanetaryMass()
          Decreases the mass (by a factor of 2) of all planets other than centralPlanet.
 void dickhead()
          Introduces a rogue planet to make things more interesting.
 void faster()
          Makes the simulation run faster.
 Planet getCentralPlanet()
          Acessor method for centralPlanet.
 java.util.ArrayList<Planet> getPlanets()
          Acessor method for collection of planets in the simulation.
 double getSimSpeed()
          Accessor method for current simulation running speed.
 int getTimeStep()
          Accessor method for current cycle number (timeStep) of simulation.
 void increaseCentralMass()
          Increases the mass (by a factor of 2) of centralPlanet.
 void increasePlanetaryMass()
          Increases the mass (by a factor of 2) of all planets other than centralPlanet.
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
          The main method.
 void pause()
          Pauses the simulaton.
 void reset()
          Resets the simulation to starting conditions.
 void resume()
          Resumes the simulation from a pause.
 void run()
          Runs the simulation.
 void slower()
          Makes the simulation run slower
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
